titles.title: Not Where We Elect To Go (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not where we elect to go But where Jesus leads the way There the living waters flow There our darkness turns to day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not our self-appointed task Will the Lord's approval win But the work we did not ask Finished humbly just for Him{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not the prayer we long to plead When we bend before the Throne But the touching deeper need Of the Spirit's wordless groan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not the gift we proudly lay On His altar will He heed If our hearts have said Him "Nay" When He whispered "I have need"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thus we die and dying live In the heavenlies with the Lord Thus we serve and pray and give Christ Himself our great reward{/lang-eng}
